Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.junit.platform.engine.support.hierarchical.Node.execute(C)
    Please use Node.execute(EngineExecutionContext, DynamicTestExecutor) instead.
    org.junit.platform.commons.util.ReflectionUtils.findAllClassesInClasspathRoot(Path, Predicate<Class<?>>, Predicate<String>)
    Use ReflectionUtils.findAllClassesInClasspathRoot(URI, Predicate, Predicate) instead.
